text: The 1980 AFC Asian Cup was the 7th edition of the men's AFC Asian Cup, a quadrennial international football tournament organised by the Asian Football Confederation. The finals were hosted by Kuwait between 15 and 30 September 1980. The field of ten teams was split into two groups of five. Category:AFC Asian Cup tournaments Category:1980 in association football Category:1980 in Asia
title: 1980 AFC Asian Cup
